## sliceBytes() function

Slice a portion of a byte array. Equivalent to `buffer.subarray(start, end)`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function sliceBytes(bytes: Uint8Array, start: number, end?: number): Uint8Array;
```

**Returns:**

Uint8Array

New Uint8Array view of the slice
